ReportSpec.Name: Food Bank Breakdown Report
ReportSpec.Description: Returns a breakdown of food bank data by various categories
ReportSpec.Author: Technical Training

DataRetrieval.CreateSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_REPORT_FOODBANKBREAKDOWN ( @STARTDATE datetime, @ENDDATE datetime, @GROUP1 nvarchar(30), @GROUP2 nvarchar(30), @GROUP3 nvarchar(30), @DATA1 nvarchar(30), @DATA2 nvarchar(30), @DATA3 nvarchar(30), @DATA4 nvarchar(30), @DATA5 nvarchar(30), @DATA6 nvarchar(30), @DATA7 nvarchar(30), @DATA8 nvarchar(30) )
with execute as owner
as
if @STARTDATE is null set @STARTDATE = (select min([TXDATE]) from dbo.[USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER])
if @ENDDATE is null set @ENDDATE = (select max([TXDATE]) from dbo.[USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER])
declare @SQL nvarchar(max) = '' declare @SelectSQL nvarchar(max) = '' declare @FromSQL nvarchar(max) = '' declare @WhereSQL nvarchar(max) = '' declare @GroupSQL nvarchar(max) = ''
--Build core SQL set @SelectSQL = 'select ''Default Group'' as [DEFAULTGROUP], ' set @FromSQL = 'from dbo.[USR_FOODBANK] f inner join dbo.[USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER] fh on fh.[FOODBANKID] = f.[ID] left join dbo.[USR_FOODBANKTXDETAIL] ft on ft.[FOODBANKTXHEADERID] = fh.[ID]' set @WhereSQL = 'where fh.[TXDATE] between ''' + convert(nvarchar,(@STARTDATE),120) + ''' and ''' + convert(nvarchar,(@ENDDATE),120) + ''''
if @GROUP1 <> '' begin set @GroupSQL = ' group by ' end
--Add optional joins if @GROUP1 in ('COUNTRY', 'STATE', 'CITY') or @GROUP2 in ('COUNTRY', 'STATE', 'CITY') or @GROUP3 in ('COUNTRY', 'STATE', 'CITY') begin set @FromSQL = @FromSQL + 'left join dbo.[CONSTITUENT] c on c.[ID] = f.[CONSTITUENTID] left join dbo.[ADDRESS] a on a.[CONSTITUENTID] = c.[ID] and a.ISPRIMARY = 1 ' end
if @GROUP1 = 'FOODBANKTYPE' or @GROUP2 = 'FOODBANKTYPE' or @GROUP3 = 'FOODBANKTYPE' begin set @FromSQL = @FromSQL + 'left join dbo.[USR_FOODBANKTYPECODE] t on t.[ID] = f.[FOODBANKTYPECODEID] ' end
if @GROUP1 = 'COUNTRY' or @GROUP2 = 'COUNTRY' or @GROUP3 = 'COUNTRY' begin set @FromSQL = @FromSQL + 'left join dbo.[COUNTRY] ct on ct.[ID] = a.[COUNTRYID] ' end
if @GROUP1 = 'STATE' or @GROUP2 = 'STATE' or @GROUP3 = 'STATE' begin set @FromSQL = @FromSQL + 'left join dbo.[STATE] s on s.[ID] = a.[STATEID] ' end
if @GROUP1 = 'FOODITEM' or @GROUP2 = 'FOODITEM' or @GROUP3 = 'FOODITEM' or @DATA1 in ('TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED', 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED') or @DATA2 in ('TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED', 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED') or @DATA3 in ('TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED', 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED') or @DATA4 in ('TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED', 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED') or @DATA5 in ('TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED', 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED') or @DATA6 in ('TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED', 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED') or @DATA7 in ('TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED', 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED') or @DATA8 in ('TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED', 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED') begin set @FromSQL = @FromSQL + 'left join dbo.[USR_FOODITEM] fi on fi.[ID] = ft.[FOODITEMID] ' end
--Add selected groupings if @GROUP1 = 'FOODBANKTYPE' or @GROUP2 = 'FOODBANKTYPE' or @GROUP3 = 'FOODBANKTYPE' begin set @SelectSQL = @SelectSQL + 't.[DESCRIPTION] as [FOODBANKTYPE], ' set @GroupSQL = @GroupSQL + 't.[DESCRIPTION], ' end
if @GROUP1 = 'FOODITEM' or @GROUP2 = 'FOODITEM' or @GROUP3 = 'FOODITEM' begin set @SelectSQL = @SelectSQL + 'fi.[NAME] as [FOODITEM], ' set @GroupSQL = @GroupSQL + 'fi.[NAME], ' end
if @GROUP1 = 'COUNTRY' or @GROUP2 = 'COUNTRY' or @GROUP3 = 'COUNTRY' begin set @SelectSQL = @SelectSQL + 'ct.[DESCRIPTION] as [COUNTRY], ' set @GroupSQL = @GroupSQL + 'ct.[DESCRIPTION], ' end
if @GROUP1 = 'STATE' or @GROUP2 = 'STATE' or @GROUP3 = 'STATE' begin set @SelectSQL = @SelectSQL + 's.[DESCRIPTION] as [STATE], ' set @GroupSQL = @GroupSQL + 's.[DESCRIPTION], ' end
if @GROUP1 = 'CITY' or @GROUP2 = 'CITY' or @GROUP3 = 'CITY' begin set @SelectSQL = @SelectSQL + 'a.[CITY], ' set @GroupSQL = @GroupSQL + 'a.[CITY], ' end
--Add selected totals if @DATA1 = 'TOTALAMOUNTDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA2 = 'TOTALAMOUNTDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA3 = 'TOTALAMOUNTDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA4 = 'TOTALAMOUNTDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA5 = 'TOTALAMOUNTDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA6 = 'TOTALAMOUNTDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA7 = 'TOTALAMOUNTDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA8 = 'TOTALAMOUNTDISTRIBUTED' set @SelectSQL = @SelectSQL + 'sum(case when fh.[FOODBANKTXTYPECODE] = 1 then ft.[FOODITEMAMOUNT]else 0 end) as [TOTALAMOUNTDISTRIBUTED], '
if @DATA1 = 'TOTALAMOUNTRECEIVED' or @DATA2 = 'TOTALAMOUNTRECEIVED' or @DATA3 = 'TOTALAMOUNTRECEIVED' or @DATA4 = 'TOTALAMOUNTRECEIVED' or @DATA5 = 'TOTALAMOUNTRECEIVED' or @DATA6 = 'TOTALAMOUNTRECEIVED' or @DATA7 = 'TOTALAMOUNTRECEIVED' or @DATA8 = 'TOTALAMOUNTRECEIVED' set @SelectSQL = @SelectSQL + 'sum(case when fh.[FOODBANKTXTYPECODE] = 0 then ft.[FOODITEMAMOUNT]else 0 end) as [TOTALAMOUNTRECEIVED], '
if @DATA1 = 'TOTALQUANTITYDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA2 = 'TOTALQUANTITYDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA3 = 'TOTALQUANTITYDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA4 = 'TOTALQUANTITYDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA5 = 'TOTALQUANTITYDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA6 = 'TOTALQUANTITYDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA7 = 'TOTALQUANTITYDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA8 = 'TOTALQUANTITYDISTRIBUTED' set @SelectSQL = @SelectSQL + 'sum(case when fh.[FOODBANKTXTYPECODE] = 1 then ft.[QUANTITY] else 0 end) as [TOTALQUANTITYDISTRIBUTED], '
if @DATA1 = 'TOTALQUANTITYRECEIVED' or @DATA2 = 'TOTALQUANTITYRECEIVED' or @DATA3 = 'TOTALQUANTITYRECEIVED' or @DATA4 = 'TOTALQUANTITYRECEIVED' or @DATA5 = 'TOTALQUANTITYRECEIVED' or @DATA6 = 'TOTALQUANTITYRECEIVED' or @DATA7 = 'TOTALQUANTITYRECEIVED' or @DATA8 = 'TOTALQUANTITYRECEIVED' set @SelectSQL = @SelectSQL + 'sum(case when fh.[FOODBANKTXTYPECODE] = 0 then ft.[QUANTITY]else 0 end) as [TOTALQUANTITYRECEIVED], '
if @DATA1 = 'TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA2 = 'TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA3 = 'TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA4 = 'TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA5 = 'TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA6 = 'TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA7 = 'TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED' or @DATA8 = 'TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED' set @SelectSQL = @SelectSQL + 'sum(case when fh.[FOODBANKTXTYPECODE] = 1 then ft.[QUANTITY] * fi.[WEIGHT] else 0 end) as [TOTALPOUNDSDISTRIBUTED], '
if @DATA1 = 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED' or @DATA2 = 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED' or @DATA3 = 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED' or @DATA4 = 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED' or @DATA5 = 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED' or @DATA6 = 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED' or @DATA7 = 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED' or @DATA8 = 'TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED' set @SelectSQL = @SelectSQL + 'sum(case when fh.[FOODBANKTXTYPECODE] = 0 then ft.[QUANTITY] * fi.[WEIGHT] else 0 end) as [TOTALPOUNDSRECEIVED], '
if @DATA1 = 'FOODBANKCOUNT' or @DATA2 = 'FOODBANKCOUNT' or @DATA3 = 'FOODBANKCOUNT' or @DATA4 = 'FOODBANKCOUNT' or @DATA5 = 'FOODBANKCOUNT' or @DATA6 = 'FOODBANKCOUNT' or @DATA7 = 'FOODBANKCOUNT' or @DATA8 = 'FOODBANKCOUNT' set @SelectSQL = @SelectSQL + 'count(distinct f.[ID]) as [FOODBANKCOUNT], '
if @DATA1 = 'TRANSACTIONCOUNT' or @DATA2 = 'TRANSACTIONCOUNT' or @DATA3 = 'TRANSACTIONCOUNT' or @DATA4 = 'TRANSACTIONCOUNT' or @DATA5 = 'TRANSACTIONCOUNT' or @DATA6 = 'TRANSACTIONCOUNT' or @DATA7 = 'TRANSACTIONCOUNT' or @DATA8 = 'TRANSACTIONCOUNT' set @SelectSQL = @SelectSQL + 'count(distinct fh.[ID]) as [TRANSACTIONCOUNT] '
--Clean up any trailing commas if right(@SelectSQL, 2) = ', ' set @SelectSQL = left(@SelectSQL, len(@SelectSQL) - 1) + ' '
if right(@GroupSQL, 2) = ', ' set @GroupSQL = left(@GroupSQL, len(@GroupSQL) - 1) + ' '
--Put it all together set @SQL = @SelectSQL + @FromSQL + @WhereSQL + @GroupSQL
--select @SQL execute sp_executesql @SQL
